#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define rep(i,s,n) for((i)=(s);(i)<=(n);(i)++)
#define trav(it,m) for(it=m.begin();it!=m.end();it++)
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define DEBUG 0
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;
typedef pair<ll, ll> pll;
typedef map<int,int> mi;
typedef vector<int> vi;
typedef vector<pii > vpii;
typedef vector<pll > vpll;
ll rkh1[1000006],rkh2[1000006],pws[1000006];
ll lmod = 1e9+7,pr = 101;
ll hasht(int s,int e)
{
	if(e<s)
		return -1;
	if(s==0)
		return rkh2[e];
	ll ans = (rkh2[e] - rkh2[s-1]*pws[e-s+1])%lmod;
	if(ans<0)
		ans+=lmod;
	return ans;
}
ll hashs(int s,int e)
{
	if(e<s)
		return -1;
	if(s==0)
		return rkh1[e];
	ll ans = (rkh1[e] - rkh1[s-1]*pws[e-s+1])%lmod;
	if(ans<0)
		ans+=lmod;
	return ans;
}
int main()
{
	pws[0] = 1;
	for(int i=1;i<1000001;i++)
		pws[i] = (pws[i-1]*pr)%lmod;
	if(!DEBUG)
	{
		ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
		cin.tie(NULL);
	}
	cout<<fixed;
	cout<<setprecision(12);
	int tc,i,j,ind;
	cin>>tc;
	string s,t;
	rep(ind,1,tc)
	{
		cin>>s>>t;
		queue<int> q;
		int l = s.length(), i = 0, maxa = 0, f;
		ll prev1 = 0, prev2 = 0;
		ll ht1,ht2,hs1,hs2;
		rep(j,0,l-1)
		{
			prev1 = (prev1*pr+s[j])%lmod;
			prev2 = (prev2*pr+t[j])%lmod;
			rkh1[j] = prev1;
			rkh2[j] = prev2;
			if(t[j]==s[0])
				q.push(j);
			while(!q.empty())
			{
				f = q.front();
				ht1 = hasht(f,j);
				ht2 = hasht(0,f-1);
				hs1 = hashs(0,j-f);
				hs2 = hashs(j-f+1,j);
				if(hs1==ht1&&hs2==ht2)
				{
					maxa = j + 1;
				}
				if(ht1==hs1)
					break;
				q.pop();
			}
		}
		cout<<"Case "<<ind<<": "<<maxa<<"\n";
	}
}
